mapper.select: SELECT ssa.id AS ssa_id, ssav.id AS ssav_id, ssa.*, ssav.*, IF (skav.sku_id, 1, 0) AS isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr ssa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value ssav ON ssa.sale_attr_id = ssav.sale_attr_id AND ssa.spu_id = ssav.spu_id AND ssa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skav ON skav.sale_attr_id = ssa.sale_attr_id AND skav.sale_attr_value_id = ssav.id AND skav.sku_id = #{skuId}
